message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its value to you, but based on my budget, I am only able to offer $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value to me is quite a bit higher. Could you meet me halfway at $13,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I need to stick to my budget. I am willing to pay up to $11,000 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
